titleStmt.title: A royall story, for loyall readers For they intended mischiefe against thee, and imagined such a device as they are not able to performe. And why? because the King putteth his trust in the Lord, and in the mercy of the most highest, hee shall not miscarry.
titleStmt.author: Dalen, Cornelius van, engraver.

notesStmt.note: Includes engraved portrait of Charles II signed: Cornelius Van Dalen sculpsit Amster:.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
